N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.1 - Patients held pursuant to the family court act

State Regulations

The director of a facility in the department and the
director of a facility issued an operating certificate by the department shall, with respect to any patient admitted to such facility pursuant to an order of
the Family Court, give immediate written notice to the Family Court when any
such patient leaves the facility without the consent of the director or is
discharged, placed on leave without consent status or transferred. When a
patient admitted pursuant to an order of the Family Court to a facility issued
an operating certificate by the department is transferred from such facility
and admitted to a facility in the department, or is discharged from such
facility to be admitted to a facility in the department, the director of the
facility to which said person was originally admitted under court order shall
notify the director of the facility to which said patient is transferred of the
status of the Family Court proceeding involving said patient, and shall notify
the Family Court of the patient's transfer or discharge. Notes
